admreg: Middle East and North Africa,Middle East and North Africa

abstracts.cdata!:
The overall objectives of the Technical
            Assistance Project are to facilitate implementation of the
            economic reform measures and to initiate the strenghtening
            of the planning and management capabilities of government
            agencies involved in the reform process. The project aims
            at: (a) upgrading key managerial, technical and
            administrative skills in the Ministry of Economy (MOE) and
            the Banque Centrale d'Algerie (BCA); (b) strengthening
            the skills of the staff of the country's seven banks;
            (c) upgrading the auditing capabilites within the country
            and initiating comprehensive audits of 20-30 enterprises on
            a pilot basis; (d) supporting improvements in the area of
            foreign liability management; and (e) improving the
            efficiency of day-to-day operations of the MOE and BCA. The
            project encompasses assistance in three areas: (a) technical
            assistance to the MOE; (b) technical assistance to financial
            sector agencies; and (c) technical assistance for
            undertaking a limited number of studies required for the
            effective implementation of the Economic Reform Program in
            the next two years.
